forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers before 4am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 68, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. West northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
